20110128230621.000|20110128230624.000|CC1|>> DO REVOLUTIONS WORK, LIKE    
20110128230624.000|20110128230626.000|CC1|HAPPENED IN TUNISIA WHERE THE   
20110128230626.000|20110128230627.000|CC1|ARMY SWITCHES SIDE.

20110128230630.000|20110128230632.000|CC1|THE PEOPLE.

20110128230633.000|20110128230635.000|CC1|OFFICIALLY OVER?

20110128230636.000|20110128230638.000|CC1|THAT'S WHAT HAPPENS IN MANY

20110128230641.000|20110128230643.000|CC1|SCENARIO TO HERE.

20110128230645.000|20110128230645.000|CC1|PEOPLE.

20110128230700.000|20110128230700.000|CC1|PEOPLE.

20110128230701.000|20110128230702.000|CC1|THE POLICE.

20110128230751.000|20110128230756.000|CC1|THE SUBCOMMITTEE ON SOUTH AFRICA

20110128230758.000|20110128230800.000|CC1|WE'RE IN A BIT OF AFTER TIGHT   
20110128230800.000|20110128230802.000|CC1|SPOT BECAUSE MUBARAK HAS BEEN ON
20110128230802.000|20110128230803.000|CC1|OUR SIDE IN A LOT OF THESE      
20110128230803.000|20110128230805.000|CC1|ISSUES, INCLUDING THE ISRAELI   
20110128230805.000|20110128230805.000|CC1|ISSUE.                          
20110128230805.000|20110128230807.000|CC1|BUT AROUND, WE KNOW HE'S A      
20110128230807.000|20110128230808.000|CC1|DICTATOR.                       
20110128230808.000|20110128230809.000|CC1|SO WHERE DO WE COME OUT ON THIS?
20110128230809.000|20110128230811.000|CC1|>> WE HAVE KNOWN FOR SOME TIME

20110128233347.000|20110128233349.000|CC1|DETERMINE THEIR OWN DESTINY.    
20110128233349.000|20110128233351.000|CC1|THESE ARE HUMAN RIGHTS.         
20110128233351.000|20110128233352.000|CC1|AND THE UNITED STATES WILL STAND
20110128233352.000|20110128233354.000|CC1|UP FOR THEM EVERYWHERE.         
20110128233354.000|20110128233356.000|CC1|I ALSO CALL UPON THE EGYPTIAN   
20110128233356.000|20110128233357.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT TO REVERSE THE       
20110128233357.000|20110128233359.000|CC1|ACTIONS THAT THEY'VE TAKEN TO   
20110128233359.000|20110128233408.000|CC1|INTERFERE WITH ACCESS IN THE    
20110128233408.000|20110128233409.000|CC1|INTERNET AND CELL PHONE         
20110128233409.000|20110128233413.000|CC1|NETWORKS.                       
20110128233413.000|20110128233416.000|CC1|AND ALSO THAT THOSE IN THE      
20110128233416.000|20110128233416.000|CC1|STREETS EXPRESS THEMSELVES      
20110128233416.000|20110128233423.000|CC1|PEACEFULLY.                     
20110128233423.000|20110128233427.000|CC1|AT THIS MOMENT OF VOLATILITY HAS
20110128233427.000|20110128233430.000|CC1|TO BE TURNED INTO A MOMENT OF   
20110128233430.000|20110128233430.000|CC1|PROMISE.                        
20110128233430.000|20110128233433.000|CC1|THE UNITED STATES HAS A CLOSE   
20110128233433.000|20110128233434.000|CC1|PARTNERSHIP WITH EGYPT.         
20110128233434.000|20110128233435.000|CC1|WE COLLABORATED ON MANY ISSUES, 
20110128233435.000|20110128233436.000|CC1|INCLUDING WORKING TOGETHER TO   
20110128233436.000|20110128233438.000|CC1|ADVANCE A MORE PEACEFUL REGION. 
20110128233438.000|20110128233442.000|CC1|BUT WE'VE ALSO BEEN CLEAR THAT  
20110128233442.000|20110128233444.000|CC1|THERE MUST BE REFORM, POLITICAL,
20110128233444.000|20110128233445.000|CC1|SOCIAL AND ECONOMIC REFORMS THAT
20110128233445.000|20110128233446.000|CC1|MEET THE ASPIRATIONS OF THE     
20110128233446.000|20110128233449.000|CC1|EGYPTIAN PEOPLE.

20110128233452.000|20110128233453.000|CC1|REFORMS, GRIEVANCES HAVE BUILT  
20110128233453.000|20110128233455.000|CC1|UP OVER TIME.                   
20110128233455.000|20110128233457.000|CC1|WHEN PRESIDENT MUBARAK ADDRESSED
20110128233457.000|20110128233506.000|CC1|THE EGYPTIAN PEOPLE TONIGHT, HE
